summary: A good base to tweak your own female asian character
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]
[size=3] HELLO GUYS!![/size][/b][/size][/color][color=#6fa8dc][size=3]
[color=#d8d8d8]  [color=#ffffff]  (sorry again for my bad english, google translate...)[/color][/color]
[/size][/color][size=3]

[color=#ffff00][b]...............................................DESCRIPTION...............................................[/b][/color]
[/size][size=4][size=3]at first, I wanted to create this mod to dedicate two Asian actresses.
I typed "asian" on the nexus to find a starting base to begin but I could not find mods offered realistic enough so i finally do it myself. I'm really happy with the result and [color=#ffd966]it's a good base for tweaking for those who would like to create his own female asian character.[/color]

[color=#f1c232]SO!![/color][/size]

[/size][size=3][color=#e69138][size=4][size=5] Shu Qi[/size] [/size][/color]                                                                                         [size=4] [color=#f1c232][size=5]Lynn Hung[/size][/color][/size][/size]
[url=http://imgur.com/T5d01SB][img]http://i.imgur.com/T5d01SB.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
[center][color=#ffff00][b]...............................................REQUIREMENT...............................................[/b][/color][size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]enhanced character edit [/url]OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57440/?]ece more body sliders[/url] (for ECE users)
[size=3][size=3][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35713/?]ecee RAN's enhanced character edit[/url][/size] (for ECE users)[/size][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4869/?]cover eyes[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?] (fourth pack)
ks hairdos hdt pack (optionnal)
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]women of skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]seductive lips hd
[size=3][/size][/url][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]any ENB[/url][/size][/size] (required for some reason describe below)
any body mod (i use cbbe)

[color=#ffff00][b]...............................................INSTALL...............................................[/b][/color]
[size=3]for ece users: just put the file "_13_commonTriRaces.slot" and/or [size=3]"_29_commonTriRaces.slot"[/size] in the CME_save folder
then go to the game, open showracemenu (i recommand this mod ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33968/?]lossless race change[/url])
choose nord race and choose the slot 13 or 29
DONE!

for new ece users: when you install "enhanced character edit" for the first time, you need to run the game at least once!
this create the CME_save folder located in your saves folder, then [/size][size=3]put the file "_13_commonTriRaces.slot" and/or [size=3]_29_commonTriRaces.slot [/size]in the CME_save folder
then go to the game, open showracemenu (i recommand this mod ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33968/?]lossless race change[/url])
choose nord race and choose the slot 13 or 29
DONE![/size]

[size=3]for racemenu users just install with your favorite mods manager and choose the preset Shu or Lynn
[/size][size=3]DONE!

[color=#ffd966][size=4]i made the black eyes myself because (for obscure reasons) i don't find mod that offering black eyes.
based on cover eyes, it replaces the ambereyes.dds
manually install the file in: skyrim/data/textures/actors/character/eyes (overwrite when ask you)[/size][/color]

[size=4][color=#cc0000][size=3][b]...............................................[/b][/size]Notice[/color][/size][color=#cc0000][b]...............................................[/b][/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=3]it may be that this does not give the same result with your skyrim,
depending on the mods you have installed, an example: if you have more
hair/eyes mods installed, when you would load the preset it will not
necessarily the same hair/eyes. (for ece users)[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]

[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]also other textures can alter the appearance, and an ENB is important because It generates occlusion culling effect affecting the shape of the face.
in my opinion,it work good with brighters enb (i use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]NLA[/url], some NLA plugs and personnal tweak)

[size=5][color=#1e84cc][size=3][size=4][size=3][b]...............................................[/b][/size][/size][/size]credit[/color][/size][color=#1e84cc][size=3][size=4][size=3][b]...............................................[/b][/size][/size][/size][/color]

[size=3]Aradia[/size]
xp 32
[b]Confidence-Man[/b]
Boris Vorontsov[/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8][/color][/size][/color][/size][color=#9fc5e8][/color][color=#9fc5e8]
[color=#a4c2f4][size=4]zoni84[/size][/color]
[size=3]Bethesda and nexus (like always)
[/size][/color][/center]
